Waste Pesticide
Collection Program

MINNESOTA DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE'S Waste Pesticide Collection Program helps farmers, small businesses, households, and other pesticide users to properly dispose of unwanted and unusable pesticides.

Thousands of people have voluntarily delivered waste pesticides to designated pesticide drop-off sites. Eliminating these potentially dangerous chemicals from our state ultimately makes Minnesota a cleaner and safer place to live and work.

Waste Pesticide Collection Staff:
